r000.name: Centre Room
r000.lookDescription: This room is somehow ornate and boring at the same time.
r000.entryCutscene: Pix thinks to themself, 'It sure is boring around here!'

r001.name: North Room
r001.lookDescription: This room feels way colder than the other rooms in the dungeon.
r001.entryCutscene: Pix shivers. 'It's pretty cold up North!'

r002.name: South Room
r002.lookDescription: There's fire blasting across the cieling here. It feels like a furnace in here.
r002.entryCutscene: Pix is sweating. 'It's pretty hot down south!'

r003.name: East Room
r003.lookDescription: There's a window looking out the horizon. The lush green field outside makes this dungeon feel grimmer than it already is.
r003.entryCutscene: Pix feels the warmth of the rising sun on their face. 'I can see the sun rising here!'

r004.name: West Room
r004.lookDescription: There's a window looking out to the ocean.
r004.entryCutscene: 'It looks really blue and pretty' Pix laments. They want to get out of the dungeon as soon as possible.

r005.name: Secret Room
r005.lookDescription: A secret room. Looks like nobody has been here in a long time.
r005.entryCutscene: Pix starts sneezing a lot. 'It's dusty in here!'

r006.name: Bat Room
r006.lookDescription: There are drawings all over the wall. They show bats flying away from fire.
r006.entryCutscene:
There is a swarm of bats blocking the way west!
'Oh no, I'm scared of bats...' Pix says to themself.

r007.name: Boulder Room
r007.lookDescription: Drawings on the wall show labourers concealing an entrance with a big rock.
r007.entryCutscene:
There's a woman looking frustrated at a boulder. At the North side of the room. 
'I almost got it outta the way!' She notices Pix behind her. 
'Oh howdy! My name is Marine!'

r008.name: Final Room
r008.entryCutscene: Pix feels really proud of themself. 'Looks like I'm at the end of the line!'
